elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions in the results line:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: a) How many people have registered for the web publishing course?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: b) How many people have registered for the photo editing course?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: c) How many people come from Lucerne?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: d) How many people will start the course on 18.02.20xx?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: e) How much does the course provider earn from the web publishing course?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: f) How much does the course provider earn on average from the women who attend a course?
